attributes.action: not give free handouts to immigrants and jobseekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
anybody who comes to this country should NOT being giving free hand outs or free housing.
any money that they receive should be noted and made to pay it all back the day they start working.
i think it should be the same as any normal bank loan which has to be repaid in full.
we can not carry on with the way things are going, our hospital, schools, OAP's and many more people are suffering from lack of funds and yet we continue to waste money on pointless projects and criminals half of which should not be in this country at all.
this should also be made the same for any UK resident who is out of work for more than 6 months

rejection.details: There are many petitions requesting similar actions in a clearer and more specific way.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
